programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: As Fantásticas Aventuras de Spirou e Fantásio, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: Spirou, ladrão disfarçado como mensageiro de hotel, se familiariza com Fantasio, um jornalista competitivo.

programme.title: Meu “Querido” Elfo, (2019, Children)
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica – um elfo doméstico – vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisarão fazer amizade com o elfo, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Thor - Caçada ao Ladrão, (2010, Adventure)
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemão Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades. Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles têm aventuras emocionantes. Nas férias, a diversão vira enrascada quando a família é confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocência.

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Fim De Uma Lenda, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Shishio partiu em seu navio blindado para derrubar o governo Meiji e devolver o Japão ao caos, levando Kaoru com ele. Para detê-lo a tempo, Kenshin treina com seu antigo mestre para aprender sua técnica final.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Stella Dallas, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: A working-class woman is willing to do whatever it takes to give her daughter a socially promising future.

programme.title: Inherit the Wind, (1960, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy and Fredric March go toe-to-toe in this powerful recreation of a titanic courtroom battle in which an attorney faces off against a fundamentalist in a Tennessee town where a teacher has been brought to trial for teaching Darwinism.

programme.title: Witness for the Prosecution, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich and Charles Laughton star in this exceptional courtroom Drama about a young man on trial for a wealthy widow's murder after he suspiciously profits from her will.

programme.title: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: Daisy Gamble, a woman who hears phones before they ring wants to quit smoking, to please her fiancee, Warren. She goes to a doctor of hypnosis to do it. But once she's under, her doctor finds out that she can regress into past lives.

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this riotously funny farce, Peter Sellers introduced the world to Jacques Clouseau, the clumsiest Inspector ever to trip over a case, who is out to stop the notorious Phantom (David Niven) from stealing the priceless Pink Panther diamond!

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Killing, (1956, Heist Films)
programme.desc: With fascinating detail, Stanley Kubrick lays bare the intricate inner-planning of a racetrack heist by a deadly mastermind (Sterling Hayden) and his crew. Co-stars Coleen Gray.

programme.title: Paths Of Glory, (1957, War)
programme.desc: This powerful, fact-based absurdity-of-war film stars Kirk Douglas as a commanding officer who defends three scapegoats on trial for a failed offensive that occurred within the French Army in 1916.

programme.title: The Gunman, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Eight years after a successful assassination, a former mercenary finds himself the target of hit squads hired to ensure his silence.

programme.title: Close Range, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his family.

programme.title: Night of the Sicario, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Natasha Henstridge (Species) stars in this action-packed thriller that will shock you at every turn. When DEA agents are ambushed by sicarios in a fatal shootout, the survivors must play a deadly game of cat and mouse to live through the night.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Years after he fought his way out of prison, Ray Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from to save his friend from the prison’s brutal human battleground, known as Hades.

programme.title: Escape Plan 3: The Extractors, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive action saga, Sylvester Stallone, Curtis Jackson, and Dave Bautista play security experts who fight to rescue Breslin’s girlfriend and a tech mogul’s daughter from a formidable prison known as Devil’s Station.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in KILL BILL; VOL. 1; as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: To Jill Johnson, it was the perfect babysitting job. The parents were away. The fridge was stocked. The children were tucked into bed. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Within arm’s reach of Polpo’s fortune, Bucciarati and team meet the unassuming Pericolo, a capo who has come to accept the treasure. In presenting the loot, Bucciarati is bestowed not only the rank of capo but also an immense duty: protect Trish Una.
programme.sub-title: The First Mission From the Boss

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hitman Team
programme.desc: After an encounter with the Hitman Team’s Formaggio, Narancia is left wondering why the world is quickly transforming around him. Narancia hunts down his assailant with a hail of bullets as Formaggio tries to understand his attacker’s tracking skills.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Narancia is unshakable as he uses firepower and CO2 detection to survive Formaggio’s body-shrinking attack. Even beneath a spider’s fangs inside Formaggio’s bottle, Narancia reveals not Trish’s whereabouts but the bullet holes his Stand has left behind.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Giorno, Abbacchio and Fugo travel to Pompeii to find a hidden key pivotal in their protection of Trish. Facing the trio, however, is more than the lonely remains of ancient Roman villas and colonnades. Fugo spots an odd figure in an even stranger mirror.
programme.sub-title: The Second Mission From the Boss

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Illuso has pulled Fugo into his mirror world as Abbacchio rushes to retrieve the key, despite Giorno’s stern advice. But Abbacchio cannot escape a similar fate, leaving him and later Giorno to resort to self-mutilation in favor of death by laceration.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Delve into the deadly battles that mold Giorno into an indispensable member of the Passione gang as he and his allies fight to protect Trish and themselves against outlandish acts of violence by members of the Hitman team.
programme.sub-title: Special Episode Golden Wind The Beginning

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Ready to escort Trish by train, the gang finds on the platform a lone turtle lingering by the drinking fountain, just as the boss instructed. But Bucciarati is stumped—departure is imminent, the enemy is closing in, and the cryptic key appears useless.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Misty wetlands await the participants as they emerge from the long tunnel. Visibility is poor and various monsters lie in wait.
programme.sub-title: Hisoka x Is So x Sneaky

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Proctors Menchi and Buhara's test consists of preparing a dish that will satisfy the palate of Gourmet Hunters.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a simple game. If they win, they earn the right to become Hunters.
programme.sub-title: Showdown x On x The Airship

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The airship arrives at the site of the Third Phase. To pass this test, entrants must reach the base of the tower within 72 hours.
programme.sub-title: Decision x By x Majority Rule?

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon chooses the challenge where the person whose candle goes out first loses, but finds his candle has been tampered with

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Leorio loses patience as Kurapika refuses to deliver the final blow. An uneasy mood settles over the five as time continues to tick away.
programme.sub-title: The Trick x To x The Trick

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With the score at 2 wins, 2 losses, the final do-or-die match is entrusted to Killua.
programme.sub-title: Trouble x With x The Gamble

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The five must vote and decide by majority rule on which path to take out of two.
programme.sub-title: Final x Test Of x Resolve

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Mista closes in on Sale, all signs seem to point to an easy kill. If only it weren’t for the truck hurtling up a mountainous Capri road stuck to his hand or Sale’s power to freeze all objects, gunman Mista would be celebrating over his enemy’s corpse.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Eddie Murphy Raw, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The record-setting #1 concert film of all time, is Eddie Murphy doing what he does best: making people laugh.

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: Flash Point, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: The creators of Kill Zone take action to the next level with a breakthrough combination of hard-hitting mixed martial arts battles and nail-biting tension.

programme.title: Ip Man, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Ip Man is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, the grandmaster of the Wing Chun style of kung fu and sifu of legendary martial arts superstar, Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In 1905, revolutionist Sun Yat-Sen visits Hong Kong to discuss plans with Tongmenghui members to overthrow the Qing dynasty. But when they find out that assassins have been sent to kill him, they assemble a group of protectors to prevent any attacks.

programme.title: Ip Man 2, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Hong Kong, martial arts instructor Ip Man encounters stiff opposition when he begins teaching the Wing Chun fighting style. But instead of bowing to his rivals' demands, he perseveres and retaliates with amazing speed and power.

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Incredible martial arts sequences mark this thriller about a legendary fighter who takes on ruthless outside oppressors in World War II-era Shanghai.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 198 A.D., when the Eastern Han Dynasty has collapsed into civil war, and the young Emperor is a puppet of prime minster and generalissimo Cao Cao (Jiang), the film singles out two famous chapters from Guan’s (Yen) many heroic adventures.

programme.title: Dragon, (2013, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Liu Jin-xi (Donnie Yen) is a village craftsman whose quiet life is irrevocably shattered by the arrival of two notorious gangsters in the local general store.

programme.title: Special ID, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Donnie Yen) infiltrates one of China's most ruthless crime syndicates. He must risk everything to protect his family and his life after the boss (Collin Chou) vows to find and kill every traitor in his organization.

programme.title: Somebody Up There Likes Me, (2013, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Nick Offerman (Parks and Recreation) stumbles through life with his best friend and the woman they both adore (Jess Weixler) in this smart, subversive comedy about watching your life fly by.

programme.title: The Overnight, (2015, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Alex (Adam Scott), Emily (Taylor Schilling) and their son RJ are new to LA. A chance meeting, introduces them to the mysterious Kurt (Jason Schwartzman), Charlotte and Max. A family playdate becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny (Adam Sandler) finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, wild bus drivers, cops on skis and 400 costumed party crashers, sometimes crazy follows you.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Funnyman Adam Sandler stars in MR. DEEDS, the hilarious remake of the classic American comedy Mr. Deeds Goes to Town.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) manages the ultimate balancing act between work and her adoring family in this comedy based on the bestseller by Allison Pearson.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller stars as Eddie, the 40-year-old confirmed bachelor who finally says "I do" to the beautiful and Lila. But during their honeymoon, the woman of his dreams turns out to be a total nightmare.

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bus driver Ralph Kramden and sanitation engineer Ed Norton are best friends who dream of making it big. Their most recent “get-rich-quick” plan finds the boys out to make their fortune by hiring a dog trainer to race their pet greyhound.

programme.title: Think Like A Man, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong, (2016, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ruby and Josh spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: Just Go With It, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After telling his girlfriend that he's married as a means of avoiding real commitment, a plastic surgeon must recruit a fake family to prove his honesty.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Hard Candy, (2005, Crime)
programme.desc: A provocative drama about a 32 year-old man who takes home a 14 year-old girl he meets on the Internet, with surprising consequences.

programme.title: The Quiet, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf and mute teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behavior of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Adventure)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Military & War Action)

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.desc: Peter Sellers’ comedic genius shines when the hapless Inspector Clouseau is presumed to be dead. However, the very much alive Inspector travels to Hong Kong to investigate a dangerous drug lord (Robert Webber). Dyan Cannon and Herbert Lom also star.

programme.title: Cold Turkey, (1971, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Dick Van Dyke stars as Clayton Brooks, minister in a small Iowa town, who takes up the challenge presented by an ad exec (Bob Newhart) for a tobacco company: any city or town in America that can give up smoking for 30 days gets $25 million dollars.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Foul Play, (1978, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Beware of the Dwarf, whispers the hitchhiker to the beautiful librarian as he dies through a screening of This Gun Is Mine. Suddenly, Hawn is propelled into a world of wild chases and deadly encounters with an assortment of weird characters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: The Straw Hats depart Whisky Peak on a mission to return the Princess of Alabasta to her kingdom while protecting her from an army of vicious assassins.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deliver Princess Vivi! The Luffy Pirates Set Sail!

programme.title: While the crew heads for Little Garden with the princess, Luffy and Zorro’s old nemesis, Axe-Hand Morgan, escapes from a Marine prison ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Try Hard, Coby! Coby and Helmeppo's Struggles in the Marines!

programme.title: Colby and Helmeppo train day and night to prove they’re tough enough to be Marines. A violent showdown with Vice-Admiral Garp will determine if they’re worth their salt.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Coby and Helmeppo's Resolve! Vice-Admiral Garp's Parental Affection!

programme.title: Luffy’s gang is running low on supplies, so they stop at Little Garden to find something to eat. Unfortunately for them, it might end up the other way around.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Ancient Island! The Shadow Hiding in Little Garden!

programme.title: Not only are there dinosaurs running wild on the island of Little Garden, but the Straw Hats soon find themselves in the middle of a gargantuan grudge match.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Huge Duel! The Giants Dorry and Broggy!

programme.title: Usopp and Luffy are fascinated by the endless battle waged between Dorry and Broggy; however, fascination turns to outrage when Monkey catches a whiff of treachery.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Gets Angry! A Dirty Trick Violates the Sacred Duel!

programme.title: Luffy’s blood boils for revenge against the assassins who sabotaged Dorry and Broggy’s battle, but he’s currently trapped between a rock and a hard place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Broggy's Bitter Tears of Victory! The Conclusion of Elbaf!

programme.title: While Luffy struggles to free himself, his friends fall into the hands of Baroque Works. Though the odds are against them, the Straw Hats will never give up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devilish Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger!

programme.title: Nami, Zorro, and the Princess are in danger of becoming exhibits in a fiendish artist’s collection, and only Luffy can save them. But he’s busy having a cup of tea.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hex on Luffy! Colors Trap!

programme.title: With his friends about to be permanently entombed in wax, Usopp is provided with the perfect opportunity to be brave and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Time to Fight Back! Usopp's Quick Thinking and Fire Star!

programme.title: After narrowly avoiding death, Luffy’s crew and the Princess set sail for Alabasta, but something large and dangerous looms in their path.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Farewell Giant Island! Head for Alabasta!

programme.title: Nami comes down with a terrible fever and the Straw Hats don’t know what to do. Looks like the Grand Line might claim another victim.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's Sick? Beyond the Snow Falling on the Sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their quest to find a doctor for Nami. Along the way, they deal with a ravenous invader and get a chilly reception from local islanders.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!

programme.title: Luffy and Sanji make a bold trek up a snow-covered mountain in search of a witch who might hold the key to curing Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Island without Doctors? Adventure in a Nameless Land!

programme.title: Ferocious, giant, snow rabbits slow Luffy and Sanji’s progress up the mountain. Meanwhile, the former king Wapol returns to the town he abandoned.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!

programme.title: Nami hovers near death while Luffy and Sanji fend off the abominable rabbits. Back at the village, Dalton leads a revolt against the dastardly Wapol.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dalton's Resolve! Wapol's Corps Land on the Island!

programme.title: An unlikely source acts as a roadblock to give Luffy some climbing room, and Zorro emerges from a snow bank cold, cranky, and ready to rumble
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: After a long journey up the mountain, Nami finally receives much-needed medical attention, but Sanji and Luffy are more interested in eating the doctor!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!

programme.title: Chopper’s first friend was a quack doctor who couldn’t cure a cold, but the old man still managed to teach the little reindeer how to care for people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!

programme.title: Luffy unleashes the full force of his Gum Gum furry on Wapol, and Chopper is amazed by the rubberman’s fierce devotion to the pirate flag.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!

programme.title: When Wapol orders his goons to attack the Straw Hats, Chopper shows off a little something he calls the Rumble Ball!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!

programme.title: Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey B. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!

programme.title: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!

programme.title: Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats rescue a man of many faces as they approach Alabasta. Sure, he’s good for a laugh, but they may regret pulling him out of the drink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive in Alabasta with precious little time to stop the rebellion. Sanji and Chopper are sent to gather supplies for a dangerous trip across the desert.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel army!

programme.title: Captain Smoker has Luffy in his grasp until a fiery stranger creates a diversion, giving the Straw Hats a chance to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Heroes' Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!

programme.title: Ace and Luffy’s happy reunion is crudely interrupted by the Billions of Baroque Works. They may be outnumbered, but these brothers are no ordinary pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!

programme.title: Before they can start their trek across the desert, Luffy and the Straw Hats are stopped at the shore by the cute – but formidable – Kung Fu Dugongs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Erumalu, the City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!

programme.title: Luffy’s crew encounters treacherous birds and man-eating foliage on its desert odyssey, and just when they think the coast is clear, a great disturbance emerges from beneath the sand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!

programme.title: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!

programme.title: Princess Vivi devises a plan to test the hearts of a gang of so-called rebels. They talk a good game, but will their bite measure up to their bark?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsène Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)

programme.desc: In the Underworld, Vampires are a secret clan of modern aristocratic sophisticates whose mortal enemies are the Lycans (werewolves), a shrewd gang of street thugs who prowl the city's underbelly.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution, (2006, Blockbusters)

programme.title: Beyond The Purple Hills, (1950, Western)

programme.title: Cow Town, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Barbed wire is brought to the open range in a secret plan is to bring sheep into the territory, and the ranchers are urged to fight against it. Gene Autry makes certain that nothing shady is going on.

programme.title: Barbed Wire, (1952, Western)

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio têm como alvo uma nova família. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espíritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentarão um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trás dos jogos cruéis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polícia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: Possuída
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irmã mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma missão desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitiço e salvá-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: Capítulo 2
programme.desc: A sequência arrapiante de Sobrenatural conta a história da família assombrada Lambert, que procura descobrir o segredo de infância misterioso que a deixou perigosamente ligada ao mundo dos espíritos.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Origem
programme.desc: Elise Rainier concorda relutantemente em usar sua habilidade de contatar os mortos para ajudar uma adolescente que se tornou alvo de uma perigosa entidade sobrenatural.

programme.title: O Espantalho
programme.desc: Amigos presos encontram espantalhos sobrenaturais em uma fazenda isolada.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Forças do Mal
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Aranhas!
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw está de volta. O gênio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança
programme.desc: Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Última Chave
programme.desc: Neste quarto filme da franquia Sobrenatural, a doutora Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) é chamada para resolver o caso de uma assombração no Novo México, localizada justamente na casa em que ela passou a infância.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria.

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vítima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajudá-la em sua vingança. Para convencê-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Caçadores de Tesouros
programme.desc: Quando a principal empresa de resgate de objetos do mundo perde um bilhão de dólares em artefatos do século XV,a arqueóloga chefe Mave Adams contrata o ex-criminoso Jack Riordan para os recuperar.

programme.title: Renegados
programme.desc: Quatro veteranos de combate são obrigados a voltar à ação quando um deles é brutalmente assassinado por uma gangue internacional. Unidos pela dor e pela fúria, eles embarcam em uma missão de vingança pelas ruas cruéis de Londres.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Daniels não demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato
programme.desc: Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Vice: A Máquina
programme.desc: Julian Michaels é um consagrado designer cuja obra maior é Vice, um resort onde as pessoas podem fazer absolutamente tudo o que desejar, sem se ater a leis ou regras, já que apenas convive com robôs travestidos de humanos.

programme.title: Rogue WARFARE 1 – Ameaça Global
programme.desc: Um grupo militar de elite dos EUA, Rússia, Reino Unido, China e França unem forças para combater uma grande e secreta rede terrorista.

programme.title: Linha de Ação
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem é o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordâncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenções por trás da investigação encomendada.

programme.title: Mercenário
programme.desc: Marley trabalha para a máfia cobrando dividas. Quando uma de suas visitas da errado e ele acidentalmente mata uma mulher, o criminoso acaba preso e com um grande sentimento de culpa. Em busca de redenção, Marley decide cuidar da filha da mulher que matou.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Cidade do Silêncio
programme.desc: Lauren, uma jornalista, é enviada para cobrir os estupros seguidos de morte que vêm ocorrendo na fronteira entre os EUA e o México. Chegando lá, descobre que esses crimes são apenas a ponta do iceberg muito mais complexa do que se poderia imaginar.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas não demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Instinto Predador
programme.desc: Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma onça branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais.

programme.title: Rota de Fuga
programme.desc: Johnnie Cooper saiu da prisão após cumprir pena por assalto à mão armada com seu pai e irmão. Ele quer viver normalmente e consegue um emprego em um posto de gasolina, mas seu irmão o visita logo.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Morgan Sullivan é um contador desempregado que vive no subúrbio ao lado de sua esposa dominadora. Buscando uma saída para sua vida sem sentido, ele decide juntar-se à multinacional Digicorp para trabalhar como espião.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Havaí em Chamas
programme.desc: Quando um supervulcão entra em erupção no Havaí, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da população antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Missão: Pandora
programme.desc: Após receber um pedido de socorro de uma embarcação, a Força Espacial Americana envia uma nave de resgate até Pandora, uma das luas de Saturno. Mas ao tentarem pousar, a tripulação descobre que o local é habitado por uma raça altamente evoluída.

programme.title: Juízo Final
programme.desc: Trinta anos após devastar a Escócia, um vírus mortal atinge a Inglaterra. Com milhões de vidas em jogo, o governo contará com a ajuda da major Eden Sinclair para encontrar a solução enquanto ainda há tempo.

programme.title: Monstro Subterrâneo
programme.desc: O despejo de lixo perto de uma cidade remota causa mutação em um monstro da caverna. Uma equipe de construção acidentalmente perturba o ninho da criatura enquanto cava um túnel, causando um ataque desastroso.

programme.title: Tudo por Justiça
programme.desc: Russell, um operário da fábrica, tenta proteger seu irmão mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta própria.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as únicas testemunhas que podem colocá-lo atrás das grandes. O perigo só aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Daniels não demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vítima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajudá-la em sua vingança. Para convencê-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Sem Lei
programme.desc: Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Fim De Uma Lenda
programme.desc: Shishio partiu em seu navio blindado para derrubar o governo Meiji e devolver o Japão ao caos, levando Kaoru com ele. Para detê-lo a tempo, Kenshin treina com seu antigo mestre para aprender sua técnica final.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: Deu Ruim
programme.desc: Dagmar trabalha em um posto de gasolina, deve dinheiro, e para piorar as coisas, está fora de seu apartamento.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: Carl Casper, um chef que perde o emprego por se recusar a aceitar as exigências do dono, empreende um projeto de venda de alimentos em um caminhão com sua ex-mulher e seu melhor amigo. Ao mesmo tempo, ele também tentará reunir sua família.

programme.title: Deu a louca na história - O Filme
programme.desc: Atti, um adolescente romano inteligente e perspicaz, consegue perturbar o imperador Nero com um de seus planos.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Golpista do Ano
programme.desc: Steven Russel é um policial religioso e bem casado. Até que um dia sofre um acidente, separa-se da mulher e resolve assumir que é gay. Começa a namorar Jimmy, mas descobre o básico: ser gay custa muito caro.

programme.title: Um Homem de Família
programme.desc: Jack Campbell é um solteiro convicto que há 13 anos desistiu de um grande amor para se tornar um empresário bem sucedido. Até que na véspera do Natal ele passa por uma experiência traumática e, ao acordar, vê-se numa nova vida.

programme.title: Minha Melhor Amiga
programme.desc: A rela��o de um homem com sua melhor amiga � colocada � prova quando ela se casa e ele � obrigado a enfrentar seus verdadeiros sentimentos.

programme.title: Crise da Meia Idade
programme.desc: Nesta divertida comédia, Pete é um terapeuta sexual bem-sucedido quando descobre, aos 30 anos, que nunca atingiu a puberdade. Agora, ele terá que navegar pelas dores e alegrias da adolescência questionando todo seu conhecimento sobre a sexualidade.

programme.title: Como conquistar uma Mulher
programme.desc: Andy Conners não faz ideia de como satisfazer as necessidades sexuais de sua namorada, Lauren Baker. Ele pede conselhos a seus amigos e a uma famosa atriz porno.

programme.title: Como Casar com um Milionário?
programme.desc: Este filme é um guia para quem sonha com um relacionamento feliz! O longa conta a história de Alicja que vai a um curso ministrado pela autora de guias de best-sellers, que revela métodos comprovados de sedução que funcionam mesmo nos casos complicados.

programme.title: O Prazer de sua Companhia
programme.desc: Um cara pede sua namorada em casamento e ela simplesmente cai morta. Seu melhor amigo insiste em arrumar encontros para ele. Certo dia, para tirar o amigo do seu pé, ele pede uma garçonete em casamento - ela aceita e uma grande confusão começa.

programme.title: Natal Sob Medida
programme.desc: Quando Steven tem que hospedar sua família para o Natal, ele recruta a "coordenadora de festas" Gretchen para trazer a alegria natalina para sua casa. O espírito natalino dela une a família de Steven, mas nenhum dos dois esperava que isso os aproximasse.

programme.title: Outono em Nova York
programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquentão que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso sério com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que terá com ela outro rápido e fácil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos é fácil ou rápido.

programme.title: À Prova de Fogo
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capitão Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trás. Em casa, ele vive pelas próprias regras. Agora Caleb terá o seu trabalho mais árduo, resgatar o coração de sua esposa.

programme.title: O Pretendente
programme.desc: Década de 1920. Após fazer um anúncio prometendo um dote generoso, um pai encontra um marido para sua filha. Será que o casamento arranjado poderá se transformar em amor verdadeiro?

programme.title: Um Amor do Passado
programme.desc: Um jogador que lutou pela carreira em um time, decide se aposentar e volta para sua cidade, cuidadosamente se esquivando de problemas do passado. As coisas mudam quando ele é obrigado a encarar sua maior decepção – a garota que ele deixou escapar.

programme.title: Apenas Uma Noite
programme.desc: História de amor, traição e ciúme. Um casal em Nova York tem que se separar, por uma noite, devido a uma viagem de negócios que o marido tem que fazer com uma atraente colega de trabalho.

programme.title: O Preço Da Coragem
programme.desc: Após o marido, repórter do Wall Street Journal Daniel Pearl (Dan Futterman, de Urbania), ser sequestrado por terroristas, Mariane (Jolie) lidera uma busca desesperada por pistas em uma corrida frenética contra o tempo para localizá-lo.

programme.title: Um Crime de Paixão
programme.desc: Um monge encontra um grupo de atores em busca de sua próxima apresentação. Logo depois de chegar a uma aldeia desconhecida, eles descobrem que uma mulher foi condenada à morte por assassinato.

programme.title: Conte Comigo
programme.desc: Sammy e Terry mantêm um vínculo inquebrável desde que ficaram órfãos, anos antes. Depois de levar um estilo de vida despreocupado, o irmão rebelde volta para a vida de Sammy e de seu filho Rudy.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra escondido começa a formar um relacionamento com sua empregada recém-contratada, Tanja, depois que ele expressa solidão a ela. Ele primeiro a trata abusivamente, mas aos poucos forma uma estranha amizade com ela.

programme.title: A Premonição
programme.desc: A vida tranquila de Claire Cooper (Annette Bening) sofre uma reviravolta quando um assassino em série (Robert Downey Jr.) invade sua idílica cidade na Nova Inglaterra... e assombra seus sonhos com pistas sombrias sobre seus próximos atos mortais.

programme.title: Marcados Pela Guerra
programme.desc: Uma jovem decide se alistar no exército na esperança de ser mandada para o Iraque, onde entraria em contato com uma nova cultura. Ela acaba, no entanto, sendo realocada para Guantánamo, onde se depara com uma rotina de ódio e abuso.

programme.title: O Homem Que Luta Só
programme.desc: Ben Brigade, caçador de recompensas, captura o valioso pistoleiro Billy John e segue para Santa Cruz, onde o entregará às autoridades e receberá o prêmio.

programme.title: A Taberna dos Proscritos
programme.desc: Zona Libre é um pequeno enclave do outro lado do rio da América. Governado despoticamente pelo General Calleja, oferece refúgio aos bandidos, a um preço.

programme.title: Django
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro carregando um caixão, entra em uma cidade que tem duas facções em guerra, o KKK e uma gangue de bandidos mexicanos. Esse é Django e ele se envolve em uma luta contra os dois lados.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Com a Corda no Pescoço
programme.desc: Condenado à forca, Henry Moon é capturado enquanto tentava fugir para o México, mas descobre que existe uma lei local que perdoa os crimes de quem se casa com uma mulher solteira ou viúva.

programme.title: Julieta dos Espiritos
programme.desc: Obra surrealista de Frederico Fellini sobre uma mulher que, convencida por um psíquico, acredita que seu marido é infiel.

programme.title: Segredos de uma Novela
programme.desc: Sally Field lidera um elenco de estrelas neste engraçadíssimo divertido look numa novela de TV dominada por escândalos.

programme.title: As Namoradas do Papai
programme.desc: A desbocada Amanda e a silenciosa e refinada Alyssa trocam identidades em um plano para aproximar Roger (pai de Alyssa) e Diana (assistente social de Amanda).

programme.title: Era uma vez na China
programme.desc: No fim do século 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violência crescendo, até tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 2
programme.desc: Na sequência do clássico, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta a seita White Lotus e protege o Dr. Sun Yat Sen, usando o Kung Fu para defender os inocentes na China em crise.

programme.title: Em Nome do Pai - S1E0
programme.desc: Maggie é uma adolescente que vive sob o domínio de seu pai, um religioso fanático. A chegada de três jovens à propriedade rural onde vivem abala suas crenças cegas, mas seu pai fará de tudo para manter seu poder na família.

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto - S1E0
programme.desc: O cão vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da família Davis, que está enfrentando tempos difíceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criança, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho.

programme.title: Agente Mirim - S1E0
programme.desc: Quando sua mãe viaja, Olívia fica sob os cuidados do seu irmão mais velho, Miles. Quando Olivia testemunha um sequestro, ninguém acredita nela, nem mesmo seu irmão. Determinada a provar seu valor, a pequena decide investigar o crime por si só.

programme.title: Você Acredita? - S1E0
programme.desc: Um pastor é questionado por um morador de rua sobre sua crença em Deus, e passa a usar essa pergunta com seus fiéis também. A partir daí, doze histórias diferentes se cruzam, cada uma com sua provação sobre até onde vai a fé em Deus.

programme.title: A Fé que nos Une - S1E0
programme.desc: Durante a Guerra do Vietnã, dois soldados escrevem cartas diárias a seus filhos, ainda crianças. Anos depois, por um golpe do destino, os filhos se encontram e embarcam em uma viagem, descobrindo o passado heroico de seus pais.

programme.title: Ma ma - S1E0
programme.desc: Após ser diagnosticada com câncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grávida. Além de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera.

programme.title: Thor - Caçada ao Ladrão
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemão Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades. Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles têm aventuras emocionantes. Nas férias, a diversão vira enrascada quando a família é confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocência.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: As Fantásticas Aventuras de Spirou e Fantásio
programme.desc: Spirou, ladrão disfarçado como mensageiro de hotel, se familiariza com Fantasio, um jornalista competitivo.

programme.title: Meu “Querido” Elfo
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica – um elfo doméstico – vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisarão fazer amizade com o elfo, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Thor - Caçada ao Ladrão
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemão Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades. Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles têm aventuras emocionantes. Nas férias, a diversão vira enrascada quando a família é confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocência.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: O Dragão de Natal
programme.desc: Ayden, uma jovem mulher na Europa medieval, é a única pessoa que pode salvar o Natal depois de um duende moribundo lhe entregar um cristal mágico. Ayden e outros órfãos devem escapar às criaturas de fantasia para devolver o feitiço ao norte.

programme.title: As Aventuras de Bailey: A Noite na Cidade
